title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1020.6 - Abandoned vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1020.6 - Abandoned vehicles

State Regulations

Vehicles abandoned in or upon vehicular crossings may be
sold or disposed of by the Triborough Bridge and Tunnel Authority in such
manner as it may deem best. Vehicles shall be deemed to have been abandoned if
found unattended in or upon vehicular crossings. However, vehicles left in such
places as may be designated by the Triborough Bridge and Tunnel Authority as
parking areas shall not be deemed to have been abandoned unless such vehicles
are permitted to remain in such areas for a period in excess of 18
hours. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1020.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
